_comment: Keep file encoded with UTF-8 to support chat formatting http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Formatting_codes

msg entries can span multiple lines, use
to indicate a line break.
error.multistorage.upgrade.pass.txt: Block is already upgraded to or past this level
error.multistorage.upgrade.hold.txt: Block must be upgraded to the previous tier first
error.multistorage.upgrade.fail.txt: Upgrade is of a higher level then what this block supports
info.multistorage.upgrade.1: Use On: Chameleon, Junkbox, Queue, Stacking
gui.assembler.slot.storage.info: Storage; used to store materials needed for crafting.
gui.assembler.slot.craft.info: Craft Output; if materials needed are available click here to craft.
gui.assembler.slot.decon.info: Deconstruction; removes applied upgrade (returning container and upgrade), breaks down containers and upgrades to crafting materials. Stack size must be equal or greater to the amount received when crafting.
gui.assembler.slot.buffer.info: Output Buffer; used as temporary storage for automation. This must be empty before more can be crafted.
gui.assembler.slot.material.info: Material Choice; defines look and material used.
gui.assembler.button.select.info: Container/Upgrade Selector; cycles between the available craftables.
gui.assembler.preview.info: Container/Upgrade Preview; rendering of the final product.
gui.multistorage.junkbox.usedspace.msg:
Maximum is based on an
items maximum stack size,
empty slots count as 64
gui.multistorage.junkbox.usedslots.msg:
Maximum can be increased
by stacking a second chest
and/or using an upgrade
gui.multistorage.queue.slot.head.out.inf: Queue Start; this is the item at the start of the queue
gui.multistorage.queue.slot.head.in.info: Insert Start; items placed here will be inserted into the start of the queue
gui.multistorage.queue.slot.tail.out.inf: Queue End; this is the item at the end of the queue
gui.multistorage.queue.slot.tail.in.info: Insert End; items placed here will be inserted into the end of the queue
gui.multistorage.queue.button.toggle.inf: Toggle; changes the slot shift-clicking inserts into
gui.multistorage.queue.list.inventory.in: Queue; items in this queue, sorted from start to end
